prerequisite: You must be able to make alchemical items
name: Alchemist Savant
text:
Herbs, tinctures, minerals, and exotic ingredients are the tools of alchemists across Khorvaire. From an alchemist’s laboratory, all manner of fantastic creations are born—from poisons to potions to fantastic devices.
As an alchemist savant, you transcend the skill of hedge wizards. You blend magic with alchemical compounds. By combining mystic energy with your recipes, you produce deadly concoctions that can rival any weapon.

features.alchemicalAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to make an attack with an alchemical item, you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Intelligence modifier
features.alchemicalInnovator(11thLevel): At 11th level, and again at 15th, 21st, and 25th, you master two formulas of your choice
features.resourcefulAlchemist(11thLevel): When you create new alchemical items, you can use existing alchemical items as components
features.alchemyMaster(16thLevel): You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls with alchemical items

flavorText: There’s magic in all things. It just takes a little work to tease it out.
